cab.content: SECRET.j BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING JUNE 3rd, 1918.1. Few further details of the fighting in CHAMPAGNE have been received since the noon battle situation was issued,' The enemy was reported to be attacking this morning between TROESNES and LOHGPONT, but the results of this attack are not yet known. It is thought that our line still runs approximately as described in today noon battle situation.2. On the rest of the front the situation remains unchanged.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1, 3rd June, 1918.Issued at 6.15 p.m.
